fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
- Base: $30
- 1 Shelf: $120
- 2 Shelves: $160
- 3 Shelves: $210
- 4 Shelves: $270
- 5 Shelves: $350

Shelves cost $100 each.

fields.name: Product:
fields.value:
- When you use Fresh Produce, you get to roll one or two additional Dice in your next Turn.
- If you're the Owner, you get to roll up to four additional Dice in your next Turn.
